meta.title: PredictX Design System
meta.purpose: Comprehensive design system guide for AI to follow when building new features in this prediction market mobile app. This document defines all visual tokens, component patterns, and implementation guidelines.
meta.appType: Mobile-first prediction market / P2P trading application

framework.icons: Lucide React (line icons, consistent stroke weight)

aesthetic.shapeLanguage: Rounded rectangles with very high radii; chips and buttons are pill-like; cards float on dark canvas
aesthetic.personality: Modern prediction market with crypto aesthetics - bold neon accents against deep blacks, trust-building visual language

designPrinciples.description: Use neon accents over deep blacks for clear visual hierarchy. Primary (#C8FF44) should pop against surfaces.
Focus on minimal text with strong iconography. Dense information with ample breathing room via vertical spacing.
Consistent pill/rounded geometry to feel soft and approachable. Everything should feel tactile and pressable.
Use subtle glows and soft shadows to lift interactive elements. Neon glow for primary actions.
Maintain aligned grids and consistent padding. Use spacing scale religiously.
Animations should enhance understanding, not distract. Scale on press, slide for reveals, fade for state changes.

primary.usage: Primary actions, accents, active states, brand elements, glows

primaryVariant.usage: Darker primary for hover states or gradients

error.usage: Negative values, 'No' bets, losses, destructive actions

surfaceMuted.usage: Badges, chips, secondary buttons, input backgrounds

caption.usage: Timestamps, badges, metadata, smallest readable text

casing.labels: Title case or capitalize first letter
casing.buttons: Title case for single words, sentence case for phrases

guidelines.inlineGap: gap-xs (8px) for tight groups, gap-sm (12px) for standard groups

icons.style: Line icons with consistent 2px stroke weight

staggering.pattern: Use style={{ animationDelay: `${index * 30}ms` }} for list items

guidelines.entrances: Use animate-slide-up with staggered delays for sections
guidelines.hovers: Scale 1.05 for icons, translate for arrows, color transitions

newFeatures.1_understand: Before building, review existing components in src/components/ to understand patterns
newFeatures.2_tokens: Use design tokens from tailwind.config.js - never use raw color values
newFeatures.3_consistency: Match spacing, typography, and border radius with existing components
newFeatures.4_animation: Add animate-slide-up or animate-fade-in with stagger delays for new sections
newFeatures.5_interaction: Include btn-press class on all tappable elements
newFeatures.6_accessibility: Maintain 48px minimum touch targets, sufficient color contrast

doNot: Use colors outside the defined palette
Create sharp corners - everything should be rounded
Use font sizes outside the defined scale
Create dense layouts without breathing room
Use light backgrounds - this is a dark theme app
Add borders without /50 opacity or using borderSubtle
Create buttons without the btn-press class
mustDo: Use semantic color names (success, error, primary) not raw hex
Apply consistent card patterns with rounded-card and shadow-card
Include glow effects on primary action buttons
Use the defined spacing scale (xxs through xxl)
Include hover states with color/scale transitions
Use lucide-react icons with consistent sizing
checklist: ✓ Using Tailwind classes from config (not arbitrary values)
✓ Icons from lucide-react with correct sizes

contentGuidelines.labels: 1-2 words maximum. Capitalize first letter only.

numbers.currency: Show $ prefix, use commas for thousands

contrast.text: Maintain WCAG AA for text on dark surfaces
contrast.primary: Reserve neon primary for accents, not body text

accessibility.focus: Use subtle glows or primary outlines on focusable elements
